author.bio_html: Join me in +NFL and +CFB

body: Sometimes new posts in my guild are stuck at the bottom for over an hour (sort by hot) when they are posted. This isn't a very busy guild so why are these topics not getting visibility?
body_html: Sometimes new posts in my guild are stuck at the bottom for over an hour (sort by hot) when they are posted. This isn't a very busy guild so why are these topics not getting visibility?

title: Why do new topics stay at the bottom for hours sometimes?

body:
As far as I can tell brand new posts are moved to the top, but if the first vote they receive is a downvote, they are moved down to the bottom basically forever. 

IMO this puts too much weight on the first few people to vote on it. It seems like newer posts should be boosted a bit more before they get dragged down by time/insufficient upvotes.
body_html:
As far as I can tell brand new posts are moved to the top, but if the first vote they receive is a downvote, they are moved down to the bottom basically forever.

IMO this puts too much weight on the first few people to vote on it. It seems like newer posts should be boosted a bit more before they get dragged down by time/insufficient upvotes.

body: To fix this, it should probably not affect the ranking until it has at least 2 downvotes and is x amount of minutes old.
